member.name: T:Rakurs.Xdml.XdmlReader
member.summary: Provides methods to read Xdml files

member.name: F:Rakurs.Xdml.XdmlReader.UnknownFormatException
member.summary: Thrown when the version of the file being read is different from the Xdml reader version

member.name: M:Rakurs.Xdml.XdmlReader.OpenFile(System.String)
member.summary: Opens and Xdml file and returns a Device varible
member.param: Full path to the Xdml file
member.returns: Device varible with settings from the Xdml file

member.name: T:Rakurs.Xdml.XdmlWriter
member.summary: Provides methods to write Xdml files

member.name: F:Rakurs.Xdml.XdmlWriter.UnknownFormatException
member.summary: Thrown when the version of the file being read is different from the Xdml reader version

member.name: M:Rakurs.Xdml.XdmlWriter.WriteFile(Rakurs.Devices.Device,System.String)
member.summary: Writes settings into an Xdml file from a Device object
member.param: File path where the Xdml will be created
